text: is a Japanese light novel and anime series created by Yuu Kamiya. 12 light novel volumes were released between April 25, 2012, and February 25, 2023. The novel was also made into a manga series by Yuu Kamiya and his wife, Mashiro Hiiragi, A TV anime series started on AT-X between April and July of 2014 with 12 episodes and 6 specials ==References== Category:2014 anime television series Category:Light novels Category:Manga
title: No Game No Life
